trans-unit.source: Describes the height or width of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Figure" />.
trans-unit.target: 描述 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Figure" /> 的高度或寬度。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML Attribute Usage

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *length*
trans-unit.target: *length*

trans-unit.source: The width or height of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure> in pixels, described as a <xref:System.Double> value.
trans-unit.target: 寬度或高度<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure>像素為單位，稱為<xref:System.Double>值。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, this value can be qualified with a unit declaration string (`px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`) see *qualifiedDouble* below.
trans-unit.target: 或者，這個值可以採用單元宣告字串 (`px`， `in`， `cm`， `pt`) 請參閱*qualifiedDouble*下方。

trans-unit.source: *qualifiedDouble*
trans-unit.target: *qualifiedDouble*

trans-unit.source: A *double* value as described above followed by one of the following unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.
trans-unit.target: A *double*值 （如上所述） 後面接著下列單元宣告字串的其中之一： `px`， `in`， `cm`， `pt`。

trans-unit.source: `px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]
trans-unit.target: `px` （預設值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]

trans-unit.source: `in` is inches; 1in==96px
trans-unit.target: `in` is inches; 1in==96px

trans-unit.source: `cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px
trans-unit.target: `cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px

trans-unit.source: `pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px
trans-unit.target: `pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px

trans-unit.source: In the following example, when the user clicks on the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure>, the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure.Width%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure> decreases.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，當使用者按一下時<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure>、<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure.Width%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure>會減少。

trans-unit.source: Below is the XAML for the sample.
trans-unit.target: 以下是範例的 XAML。

trans-unit.source: Below is the code used to decrease the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure.Width%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure>.
trans-unit.target: 以下是用來減少的程式碼<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure.Width%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" />.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> 的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The number of device-independent pixels (96 pixels-per-inch) that make up the length.
trans-unit.target: 長度是由與裝置無關 (Device-Independent) 的像素數目 (每吋 96 個像素) 組成。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> class with the specified number of pixels in length.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定像素的長度，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, when the user clicks on the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure>, the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure.Width%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure> decreases.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，當使用者按一下時<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure>、<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure.Width%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure>會減少。

trans-unit.source: Below is the XAML for the sample.
trans-unit.target: 以下是範例的 XAML。

trans-unit.source: Below is the code used to decrease the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure.Width%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure>.
trans-unit.target: 以下是用來減少的程式碼<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure.Width%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.FigureLength.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.FigureLength.Value" /> 類別的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.FigureLength.Value" /> of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FigureLength.FigureUnitType" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.FigureLength.Value" /> 類別的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FigureLength.FigureUnitType" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> class with the specified <see cref="P:System.Windows.FigureLength.Value" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.FigureLength.FigureUnitType" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FigureLength.Value" />，初始化 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FigureLength.FigureUnitType" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, when the user clicks on the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure>, the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure.Width%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure> decreases.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，當使用者按一下時<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure>、<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure.Width%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure>會減少。

trans-unit.source: Below is the XAML for the sample.
trans-unit.target: 以下是範例的 XAML。

trans-unit.source: Below is the code used to decrease the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure.Width%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure>.
trans-unit.target: 以下是用來減少的程式碼<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure.Width%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure>。

trans-unit.source: Compares two <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> structures for equality.
trans-unit.target: 比較兩個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> 結構是否相等。

trans-unit.source: The two <xref:System.Windows.FigureLength> structures must be exactly the same in every way, not just have the same <xref:System.Windows.FigureLength.Value%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這兩個<xref:System.Windows.FigureLength>結構必須完全相同的每一種方式，不只具有相同<xref:System.Windows.FigureLength.Value%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to compare to this instance.
trans-unit.target: 要與這個執行個體比較的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Object" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> and whether it is identical to this <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" />.
trans-unit.target: 判斷所指定 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 是否為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" />，且是否與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> 相同。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="oCompare" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> and is identical to this <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="oCompare" /> 是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> 並且與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> 相同，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> to compare to this instance.
trans-unit.target: 要與這個執行個體比較的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" />。

trans-unit.source: Compares two <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> structures for equality.
trans-unit.target: 比較兩個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> 結構是否相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="figureLength" /> is identical to this <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="figureLength" /> 等於這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> 則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the unit type of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FigureLength.Value" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FigureLength.Value" /> 的單位類型。

trans-unit.source: The unit type of this <see cref="P:System.Windows.FigureLength.Value" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FigureLength.Value" /> 的單元型別。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.FigureUnitType.Auto" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="F:System.Windows.FigureUnitType.Auto" />。

trans-unit.source: The value that goes along with this unit type can be found using the <xref:System.Windows.FigureLength.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用找到的值，此單位類型<xref:System.Windows.FigureLength.Value%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: To set the value of this property, use the <xref:System.Windows.FigureLength.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定這個屬性的值，請使用<xref:System.Windows.FigureLength.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> 的雜湊程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The hash code for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> 結構的雜湊程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that determines whether this <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> holds an absolute value (in pixels).
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值決定此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> 是否為絕對值 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: **true** if this <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> holds an absolute value (in pixels); otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **true**如果這個<see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" />保存絕對值 （以像素為單位），否則**false**。

trans-unit.source: The default value is **false**.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 **false**。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that determines whether this <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> is automatic (not specified).
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值決定此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> 是否為自動 (未指定)。

trans-unit.source: **true** if this <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> is automatic (not specified); otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **true**如果這個<see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" />為自動 （未指定）; 否則**false**。

trans-unit.source: The default value is **true**.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是**true**。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that determines whether this <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> has a <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureUnitType" /> property value of <see cref="F:System.Windows.FigureUnitType.Column" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值決定此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> 是否擁有 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureUnitType" /> 的 <see cref="F:System.Windows.FigureUnitType.Column" /> 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: **true** if this <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> has a <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureUnitType" /> property value of <see cref="F:System.Windows.FigureUnitType.Column" />; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **true**如果這個<see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" />具有<see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureUnitType" />屬性值為<see cref="F:System.Windows.FigureUnitType.Column" />，否則**false**。

trans-unit.source: The default value is **false**.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 **false**。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that determines whether this <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> has a <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureUnitType" /> property value of <see cref="F:System.Windows.FigureUnitType.Content" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值決定此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> 是否擁有 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureUnitType" /> 的 <see cref="F:System.Windows.FigureUnitType.Content" /> 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Returns **true** if this <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> has a <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureUnitType" /> property value of <see cref="F:System.Windows.FigureUnitType.Content" />; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: 傳回**true**如果這個<see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" />具有<see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureUnitType" />屬性值為<see cref="F:System.Windows.FigureUnitType.Content" />，否則**false**。

trans-unit.source: The default value is **false**.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 **false**。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that determines whether this <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> has a <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureUnitType" /> property value of <see cref="F:System.Windows.FigureUnitType.Page" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值決定此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> 是否擁有 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureUnitType" /> 的 <see cref="F:System.Windows.FigureUnitType.Page" /> 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: **true** if this <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> has a <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureUnitType" /> property value of <see cref="F:System.Windows.FigureUnitType.Page" />; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **true**如果這個<see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" />具有<see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureUnitType" />屬性值為<see cref="F:System.Windows.FigureUnitType.Page" />，否則**false**。

trans-unit.source: The default value is **false**.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 **false**。

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> structure to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> 結構。

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> structure to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第二個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> 結構。

trans-unit.source: Compares two <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> structures for equality.
trans-unit.target: 比較兩個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> 結構是否相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="fl1" /> and <paramref name="fl2" /> are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="fl1" /> 和 <paramref name="fl2" /> 相等，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Windows.FigureLength.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 這個運算子的對等方法是<xref:System.Windows.FigureLength.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> structure to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> 結構。

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> structure to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第二個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> 結構。

trans-unit.source: Compares two <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> structures for inequality.
trans-unit.target: 比較兩個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> 結構是否相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="fl1" /> and <paramref name="fl2" /> are not equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="fl1" /> 和 <paramref name="fl2" /> 不相等，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is the negation of <xref:System.Windows.FigureLength.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 這個運算子的對等方法是否定<xref:System.Windows.FigureLength.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.String" /> representation of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" />.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> 表示。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> representation of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> 表示。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FigureLength" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <c>1</c>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<c>1</c>。

trans-unit.source: The unit type of this value can be found using the <xref:System.Windows.FigureLength.FigureUnitType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用找到此值的單位類型<xref:System.Windows.FigureLength.FigureUnitType%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: To set the value of this property, use the <xref:System.Windows.FigureLength.%23ctor%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.FigureLength.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定這個屬性的值，請使用<xref:System.Windows.FigureLength.%23ctor%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.FigureLength.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。
